item.title: Restu add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "By the sun and its brightness And [by] the moon when it follows it And [by] the day when it displays it And [by] the night when it covers it And [by] the sky and He who constructed it And [by] the earth and He who spread it And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness, He has succeeded who purifies it, And he has failed who instills it [with corruption]." -- Anonymous

item.title: Restu add a quote by Hadist
item.description: "6 pemberian Allah yang baik: Akal, tingkah laku yang baik, teman yang setia pada kebenaran, hati yang sabar, kemampuan menjaga lisan dan kematian." -- Hadist

item.title: Restu add a quote by Wise man
item.description: "Tiga benteng orang mukmin: Masjid, berdzikir kepada Allah, membaca Al-Qur'an." -- Wise man
